name: Evergreen - Mountain Life Simulator: PROLOGUE
description:
Evergreen is a simulation game about leaving the stress of the city behind and starting a new life in a mountain valley.

This simulation game is meant to be a relaxing and calming experience. Forget about stressful hunger, health or temperature meters. Build your house with your own hands, collect the resources that nature provides, travel to a small village to sell what you don't need, buy supplies in stores and admire the wonders of nature.


  • In the Evergreen prologue, you will be able to experience your first day in the valley.
  • The map size is limited, but the main mechanics are all there and polished.
  • Chop down trees, mine stone and start building your new home in this beautiful world.
  • Take your car and travel to a nearby town to buy some supplies or furniture to decorate your place.

Don't forget to add the full game to your wishlist and visit the store page to see what is included in the complete game!
